a drop/to drip
a drop/to drip

sentences.english: It rained for a whole night.
sentences.chinese: 雨，滴滴答答的下了一整夜。

sentences.english: Fruit wine, full of strong aroma to the last drop, Bring you a sweet dream.
sentences.chinese: 滴滴香濃的果汁酒，送您一個甜蜜的夢。

sentences.english: Ticker is slang for one's heart because your heartbeats similar to the way in which a clock ticks.
sentences.chinese: 對，心臟是像鐘錶那樣滴滴答答地跳動。

sentences.english: Once it rained, water dripped inside and the ground became muddy.
sentences.chinese: 一遇到下雨，屋內就滴滴答答的漏水，地上一片泥濘。

sentences.english: Part the of the allure of subversive art like this is the shock value. Why would a lovable character be welding a bloody knife?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼一個嬌滴滴的形象要變成拿着把血淋淋的刀？

sentences.english: He read all the interesting bit in the newspaper .
sentences.chinese: 他把報紙上點點滴滴有趣的新聞都讀了。

sentences.english: WHO put its authority behind the use of DDT for indoor residual spraying.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織支持使用滴滴涕進行室內殘留噴灑。

sentences.english: Stick with your plan and keep track of your progress.
sentences.chinese: 堅持計劃，並記錄進步的點點滴滴。

sentences.english: He tried to appease the crying child by giving him candy.
sentences.chinese: 這個小孩哭哭滴滴的，他拿出糖果盡力安慰他不要哭。

sentences.english: This applies to everything in your life.
sentences.chinese: 這適用於你生活的點點滴滴。

sentences.english: This feeling ripples in my heart lake, diffusion, bit by bit.
sentences.chinese: 這種感覺漣漪般的，在我的心湖擴散，點點滴滴。

sentences.english: So we learn to appreciate and thank the dribs and drabs in life.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們要學會感恩，感謝生命中的點點滴滴，。

sentences.english: The residual amounts of HCHs and DDTs in soil of Lanzhou area are lower compared with that of other cities.
sentences.chinese: 其他城市相比，土壤中滴滴涕和六六六的殘留量較低。

sentences.english: In the season that the day freezes coldly, the hair was become sweet brittle article.
sentences.chinese: 天寒地凍的季節裏，頭髮成了嬌滴滴的易碎品。

sentences.english: Many microorganisms possess the ability to dehydrohalogenate DDT to DDE.
sentences.chinese: 許多微生物使滴滴涕脫鹵化氫變爲滴滴依。

sentences.english: Many microorganisms possess the ability to dehydrohalogenate DDT to DDE.
sentences.chinese: 許多微生物使滴滴涕脫鹵化氫變爲滴滴依。
